name: GuessMe!
description:
GuessMe! is a guessing game where you and your friends answer questions and try to guess each other's answers!

The game works at any screen resolution. Simply click the fullscreen button on the bottom right, or head to GuessMe.io! (Itch.io requires a fixed size!) GuessMe.io also works on mobile! Description

GuessMe! is a guessing game where you and your friends answer questions and try to guess each other's answers!

Play with your friends, your classmates, your crush or your family to get to know each other better! Or, play in the public lobby with many people together to guess the most popular answer to questions! 

  • Example: In a private room, the topic is Fast Food! The question would ask "Coca cola or Pepsi?" You and your friends would answer the question and try to guess each other's preference. The person with the most guesses wins!
  • Example 2: In the public lobby, the topic is Fast Food! The question would ask "Coca cola or Pepsi?" You would answer the question and try to guess what is the most popular preference among GuessMe! players. The person with the most guesses wins the round!

Choose from an ever-growing selection of question banks made by players around the world. You can guess your friends' favorite food, their favorite music artist or even their favorite Pokemons! Find the type of question banks you want to play, or you can even make a question bank yourself, to play with friends!

This game is also playable at GuessMe.io! The official Discord server is here.

How to Play

To play with friends: Create a room and invite your friends in. You can then select a question bank and start guessing!

To play alone: Join the public lobby, and guess the most popular answer to all kinds of questions! The players in lobby can vote on which type of questions to guess next.

GuessMe! also works on mobile!
